definition: person/character (in a play, novel etc)/protagonist/CL:個|个[ge4]
the man (or woman) of the moment (idiom)/influential figure
representative individual (of a school of thought)
smooth talker/fast talker/slick and sociable person/person in the news

sentences.english: Madame Defarge was one of the leading spirits of the Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 迪法热夫人是这场革命的主要人物之一。

sentences.english: " The romance of the Three Kingdoms " in figure on each side of its state, long or short.
sentences.chinese: 《三国演义》中的人物各具其态，有长有短。

sentences.english: It is the great who is assailed by envy.
sentences.chinese: 正是大人物才受到嫉妒的中伤。

sentences.english: Whether it is animals or ancient figures will let you clap wow .
sentences.chinese: 无论是动物还是古代人物都会让你拍手叫绝。

sentences.english: In the arms of a suspect was arrested near the burial.
sentences.chinese: 一可疑人物在武器埋藏地附近被逮捕。

sentences.english: I don't like too much plot , because I prefer things to be character-driven.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢过多的情节，因为我喜欢由人物推动的故事。

sentences.english: Action figures and games & puzzles saw increases of four per cent and one per cent.
sentences.chinese: 动画人物和游戏及拼图看到了百分之百分之一4增加。

sentences.english: Jam Ho is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Jam Ho and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 吴昭仪也是个平凡人，是跟你我一样的小人物。

sentences.english: This mirrors the situation when we are watching a public figure apologizing.
sentences.chinese: 这反映了我们观看一个公众人物道歉时的状态。

sentences.english: Types existed in personage's image-building in the novels of the Ming and Qing Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 明清讲史小说在人物形象塑造上存在着类型化倾向。

sentences.english: Leadership Don't get blinded by the cult-hero worshiped "Big L" leaders;
sentences.chinese: 领导能力无须盲目崇拜“大人物”领导者。

sentences.english: With strong and thick bodies, the characters appear abstract and simple and their hands either stretch or clench.
sentences.chinese: 人物身条浑厚，手指若伸若握，抽象简洁。
惠勒先生是个什么人物？

sentences.english: Outlaws of the marsh the loyalty and patriotism thought is manifests through the different character.
sentences.chinese: 《水浒传》的忠义思想是通过不同人物体现出来的。

sentences.english: Opposition politicians blame the government, saying a river project has reduced farmland.
sentences.chinese: 反对党的政治人物指责政府河川的计划使得农地减少。

sentences.english: We're always looking for influence, especially with music.
sentences.chinese: 我们总是在寻找具有影响力的人物，尤其是在乐坛。

definition: role/character in a novel/persona/also pr. [jiao3 se4]
to model/to mold/(fig.) to create (a character, a market, an image etc)/(literature) to portray (in words)
representative individual (of a school of thought)
hero (of a novel or film)/main protagonist
the man (or woman) of the moment (idiom)/influential figure
